Base class implementation for Geometry element. The derived classes will compute shape functions and shape functions derivatives with respect to the global coordinate system. There is no physics implemented in this and the derived classes. More...

Classes

class  voom::GeomElement

Namespaces

namespace  voom
 

Ionic model for Rabbit Purkinje structure. Developed based on the paper by Corrias et al titled "Ionic mechanisms of electrophysiological properties and repolarization abnormalities in rabbit Purkinje fibers", American Journal of HeartCirculation Physiology, Feb 2011

  • Added Faster computation as suggested by Whiteley. We do Explicit update on Linear ODE and Newton-Raphson on Non-Linear ODE's.

Detailed Description

Base class implementation for Geometry element. The derived classes will compute shape functions and shape functions derivatives with respect to the global coordinate system. There is no physics implemented in this and the derived classes.
